title: Meaty Lasagne with Aubergine
ingredients: ['12 Sheets of Lasagne Pasta', 'Grated Cheese for on top (I used a cheddar and mozzarella mix)', '---', 'For the Meaty Filling', '1kg Minced Beef', '1 Aubergine (diced)', '1 Onion (diced)', '1 Celery Stick (chopped)', '400g Chopped Tomatoes', '400g Passata', 'Dash of Red Wine', '12 Basil Leaves (chopped)', '1 tsp Dried Oregano', '1 Beef Stock Cube', '1 tbsp Olive Oil', '---', 'For the White Sauce', '125g butter', '800ml milk', '75g plain flour', '1 egg', 'Pinch of Nutmeg', 'Pinch of Salt']
